data.meta_description: Learn about Grant Show on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Grant Show, such as Melrose Place and Devious Maids.
data.text:
Before and After

Addison, Naomi and Sam rush Archer to Seattle Grace, where they reunite with old friends in hope of saving his life; Izzie devises a medical game to teach the interns; Owen runs into someone significant from his past.

The Forever People

The investigation into frozen bodies found floating in a body of water in Nevada leads the team to believe the victims were members of a cult; J.J. confronts her trauma over her abduction.

Wedding Bell Blues

After Brenda spends a forbidden weekend with Dylan, her father insists they break up; Kelly pursues construction worker Jake Hanson.

Tempting Faith

Addison's brother makes a surprise visit, causing trouble for her, Sam and Naomi; Meg comes back to try and make it work with Pete; a patient accused of a crime angers Violet and Dell.
